name: Hi Hi Puffy Bu
overview:
"Hi Hi Puffy Club", more accurately titled "Hi Hi Puffy Bu" is Puffy AmiYumi's reality television series, which premiered on TV Asahi on 5 July 2006. The show stars both Ami Onuki and Yumi Yoshimura, and its opening credits include them in a cel-shaded manga. The theme song for the series is "Shall We Dance?" from their Splurge album.

The spoken title of the show in Japanese is meant to be something of a joke. It is often called "Hi Hi Puffy Club" in the west.
